word_mean: 江湖医术：不具有知识及技能而冒充内行，在医学上则为江湖医术

sentence.Network_en: There is no philosophy in the period between Kant and myself; only mere University charlatanism.
sentence.Network_cn: 在康德和我自己之间的这一时期,没有哲学家, 仅有大学庸医而已.

sentence.Network_en: They also bared the basic charlatanism underlying all of the Chiang regime's tactics.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些事实也暴露了蒋政权各种手法的卑鄙本质.
